intro: Last year I completed my training as a junior frontend developer alongside my school education. At the Developer Akademie, I built professional web applications using JavaScript & Angular. To continuously improve my programming skills, I am always on the lookout for interesting projects and job opportunities in the market.
firstAbout: I have developed solution-oriented skills as a frontend developer, which enable me to come up with innovative and intelligent ideas to fix bugs and start new projects.
secoundAbout: In team and solo projects, I learned how to plan and organize new projects. I also improved my communication skills in a team for more successful project results.
slills-text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
PortfolioSpan: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
Pollo: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
contentContact: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
agrreeContact: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
DABubble: The task management web application simplifies collaboration among multiple users, providing straightforward features for creating, assigning, and tracking tasks.
